title: Revenue generated by Rovio Entertainment 2010 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 9.
Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million euros is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2018.
Maximum Revenue in million euros, about 297.2 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Revenue in million euros, of value 6.5 was reported at Year 2010

The line rapidly increased by 1063.08% from Year 2010 to 2011, and lastly, increased by 101.32% from Year 2011 to 2012.
